messageBody:
Hi,

I would like to be able to specify in each TestCase which customer
requirement (a string identifier) that test contributes towards.

I hope to then use CruiseControl to report on how many _requirements_
were fully passed, and which failed.

Some tests will have no customer requirement, and some requirements
will have several tests if the requirement is broad.

I don't see a way to relate tests to requirements yet.

I'm thinking about creating a subclass of TestCase that has a method
to ask the test which requirement it is for, then writing a new
testrunner which reports these in the results...

Or should I work more towards post-processing the result.xml file, to
find the testnames and add in which test they are to satisfy? I want
the developer of the test to state this. Maybe they could use a
particular formatted comment, which I could parse and use to augment
the results?

The method I come up with I may have to impose on other groups within
this project, so I don't want it to be heavy handed, if possible.

Thanks for any suggestions,

Nick
